job.name: TpcPrompt
job.command: cd ${SUBMITTINGDIRECTORY} setenv STARFPE NO # setenv NODEBUG yes # setup 64b # starver TFG19d # staver .DEV2 set base = `basename ${INPUTFILE0} .root` set output = ${base}TpcHitZTMfl0.root if (! -r ${output}) then root.exe -q -b ${INPUTFILE0} 'TpcPrompt.C+("TpcHit")' >& ${base}TpcHitZTMfl0.log endif root.exe -q -b lBichsel.C ${base}TpcHitZTMfl0.root 'dEdxFit.C+("Z","GP","R",-1,-1,1,1,10,1,206,212)' >& ${base}Z.log root.exe -q -b lBichsel.C ${base}TpcHitZTMfl0.root 'dEdxFit.C+("ZL","GP","R",-1,-1,1,1,10,1,0,3.0)' >& ${base}ZL.log root.exe -q -b lBichsel.C ${base}TpcHitZTMfl0.root 'dEdxFit.C+("T","GP","R",-1,-1,1,1,10,1,0,12.0)' >& ${base}T.log root.exe -q -b lBichsel.C ${base}TpcHitZTMfl0.root 'dEdxFit.C+("ZLM","Freq","R",-1,-1,1,1,10,1,200,220.0)' >& ${base}TFreq.log
